title: What is that huge home on hwy 133  in Rocky Point nc  less than a mile from Pauls Place on the left going towards the elementary school
text: Hello. MyReporter.com is designed to answer questions of general interest rather than those about private residences. If you are interested in learning more about a specific property, here's a link that explains how you can find out more: http://www.myreporter.com/2016/03/how-do-i-find-out-about-a-specific-property-in-pender-county/
